short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and easy-to-use daily checklist tool that facilitates daily task management and historical checklist query.
short.zh_CN: 一款简洁易用的每日清单工具，方便每日事项管理，历史清单查询。
